text: Sift the flour. Add a pinch of salt and mix in. In a bowl, add the sifted flour, baking soda and milk. Mix to form a soft dough. Lay the scone dough on a well-floured cutting board.  Roll to 1 inch / 2.5 cm thick. Cut with a round cutter (or the mouth of a glass) and lay the separate scones on a baking tray lined with baking paper. Bake in a moderate oven for about 10 - 12 minutes.  Serve hot with butter.
